title: Senior Java Developer
description: Join a Fortune 500 financial services client to build and maintain enterprise Java applications. You'll work with microservices architecture, Spring Boot, and cloud technologies.
requirements: 7+ years of Java development experience
Strong experience with Spring Boot, REST APIs, and microservices
Experience with AWS or Azure cloud platforms
Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes)
Excellent communication skills

title: Cloud Infrastructure Engineer
description: Healthcare technology client seeking a Cloud Infrastructure Engineer to design, implement, and manage cloud infrastructure on AWS and Azure. HIPAA compliance experience preferred.
requirements: 5+ years of cloud infrastructure experience
Strong AWS and/or Azure certifications preferred
Experience with Terraform, CloudFormation, or similar IaC tools
Knowledge of security best practices and compliance frameworks
Healthcare industry experience a plus

title: Data Analyst
description: Financial services firm seeking a Data Analyst to transform business data into actionable insights. You'll work with stakeholders to identify trends and support decision-making.
requirements: 3+ years of data analysis experience
Proficiency in SQL, Python, or R
Experience with BI tools (Tableau, Power BI, or similar)
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Financial services background preferred

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Technology company seeking a DevOps Engineer to build and maintain CI/CD pipelines, automate infrastructure, and improve deployment processes.
requirements: 4+ years of DevOps or SRE experience
Strong experience with Jenkins, GitLab CI, or GitHub Actions
Proficiency with Docker, Kubernetes, and container orchestration
Experience with monitoring tools (Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog)
Scripting skills (Bash, Python)

title: IT Project Manager
description: Enterprise retail client seeking an experienced IT Project Manager to lead technology initiatives from planning through delivery. PMP certification required.
requirements: 7+ years of IT project management experience
PMP or equivalent certification required
Experience with Agile and Waterfall methodologies
Strong stakeholder management and communication skills
Retail or e-commerce experience preferred
